data.lyric:
[ti:Please Come Home For Christmas]
[ar:Eagles]
[al:Please Come Home for Christmas]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Please Come Home for Christmas (2013 Remaster) - Eagles
[00:07.69]Bells will be ringing the sad sad news
[00:13.26]
[00:15.47]Oh what a christmas to have the blues
[00:21.05]
[00:23.49]My baby's gone i have no friends
[00:28.91]
[00:31.56]To wish me greetings once again
[00:36.59]
[00:38.87]Choirs will be singin' 'silent night'
[00:44.74]
[00:47.47]Christmas carols by candlelight
[00:52.45]
[00:54.81]Please come home for christmas
[00:56.62]
[00:58.54]Please come home for christmas
[01:00.67]
[01:02.92]If not for christmas by new year's night
[01:08.15]
[01:10.72]Friends and relations send salutation
[01:16.02]
[01:19.47]Sure as the stars shine above
[01:24.00]
[01:27.04]But this is christmas yes christmas my dear
[01:32.30]
[01:34.69]It's the time of year to be with the one you love
[01:39.71]
[01:41.84]So won't you tell me you'll never more roam
[01:47.80]
[01:50.26]Christmas and new year will find you home
[01:55.68]
[01:57.93]There'll be no more sorrow no grief and pain
[02:03.47]
[02:05.83]And i'll be happy happy once again
[02:11.28]
[02:28.52]Ooh there'll be no more sorrow no grief and pain
[02:34.54]
[02:37.00]And i'll be happy christmas once again
